content: I do not have access to current crime statistics and up-to-date information about specific locations, but it is advisable for tourists to exercise caution and be aware of their surroundings at all times, especially in unfamiliar areas. it is always a good idea for tourists to consult local authorities and obtain information about any potential risks and hazards. additionally, it is recommended that tourists do not venture alone in unfamiliar areas, especially at night. moreover, tourists should avoid flaunting valuables or carrying a lot of cash with them.
